details.description:
Available for Immediate Move-In
Welcome to the Penthouse Residence at 431 Columbia Street ? a beautifully crafted three-bedroom, two-bathroom floor-through home that blends modern sophistication with everyday comfort in the heart of Red Hook, Brooklyn.
Be the first to live in this thoughtfully designed space, featuring a private terrace? a rare city retreat offering both open-air tranquility and elevated views.
Inside, every detail has been considered for comfort and convenience. Enjoy Mitsubishi Electric split-system climate control in all bedrooms and the living area, hardwood flooring, modern lighting, ample closet space, and an in-unit LG washer and dryer.
At the heart of the home, the open-concept chef?s kitchen features a full suite of KitchenAid stainless steel appliances, including an electric range, refrigerator, dishwasher, and vented microwave. Rich wood cabinetry, elegant countertops, and a chevron-tiled backsplash complete the modern design with timeless style.
The shared full bathroom, located off the main living area, showcases sleek chrome and brushed metal finishes. The primary suite includes an en-suite bath with a calming, spa-inspired palette and its own temperature control for personalized comfort.
Just steps from Van Brunt Street?s vibrant shops, caf?s, and acclaimed restaurants, this home places you at the center of Red Hook?s creative energy and tight-knit community.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C

details.description:
Luxury Living in Ditmas Park ? No Broker Fee (Photos are of a similar unit with same finishes)
This beautiful elevator building is nestled on a picturesque, tree-lined street and ready for an August 1st move-in!
Apartment Features: Spacious bedrooms with ample closet space
- Back yard - Generously sized living area - Abundant natural light throughout - Gleaming hardwood floors - Individual split units in each room for personalized climate control
Building Amenities: Resident lounge Fully furnished rooftop and outdoor spaces Bike storage On-site laundry room Co-working space with computer stations and complimentary Wi-Fi State-of-the-art fitness center
Prime Location: Just steps from the B/Q and 2/5 subway lines ? convenient access to everything Brooklyn and beyond has to offer!
No broker fee Available now Pets welcome

details.description:
Huge renovated 2.5br. These have been used at 3brs in the past and each room has a private entrance and window but very little common space. Works a lot better as a large 2br with one of the additional rooms used as common space. You?ll get a sense of the space by seeing the video. If you can?t see it, please see the listing on StreetEasy or text me and I can send it to you. note . the apartment is unfurnished and do not come with bed frames show in photos
This apt is beautifully renovated with: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Windows in all bedrooms plus a small skylight in the living room Heat/AC units in each room allowing you to control temp per room (huge savings on utilities) Laundry in the building Owner will purchase standing closets if needed. Fantastic locations with tons of local spots to enjoy Located 2min walk to L and M train lines in prime Bushwick (myrtle/wyckoff stop of L/M)
Pets ok No broker fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to take a look right away!

Chic 2 Bedroom / 1bath Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! Large living room. Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train.
Featuring: - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - Roof deck - Garage - Zipcar in Garage, yas!
Such a great location, with tons of cafe's, bars and restaurants within a five minute walk! Variety Coffee, Taquiera Cocoyoc, Milk and Pull, The Johnson's, Maria Hernandez Park, and many more!
Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!!

details.description:
77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

details.description:
Spacious 3BR in Prime Fort Greene ? Laundry In-Unit, Incredible Location
Welcome to 352 Myrtle Ave ? a massive 3-bedroom, 1-bath apartment with in-unit laundry in the heart of Fort Greene.
Live next to Third Falcon (named one of NYC?s Top 100 Restaurants) and Los Burritos Juarez, a new local gem from a celebrated chef. Just steps from Fort Greene Park, home to a beloved Saturday farmers and flea market, and surrounded by the best of DeKalb Ave?s caf?s, bars, and restaurants.
Enjoy a lifestyle that blends historic brownstone charm with modern Brooklyn energy. Art galleries, indie bookstores, outdoor yoga, cozy coffee shops ? all part of daily life here.
Walk to Wegmans, Trader Joe?s, Whole Foods, and take the NYC Ferry for a scenic commute.
Don?t miss this rare, oversized unit in one of Brooklyn?s most vibrant and welcoming neighborhoods.

details.description:
Amazing location blocks from Prospect Park in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Feel the history of Brooklyn on brownstone-lined streets and in locally owned bars, restaurants, coffee shops and more. Not only will you have the chance for somewhat of a city escape, but you will still have everything you need around you with full size grocers, pharmacies, bodegas, liquor stores, retail shops, tattoo shops, whatever your heart desires! You won't be miss out on any luxuries inside your new home at The Ballgreen Complex either! Fully equipped with all a renter could need in NYC. Come on by and take a look with us!
Conveniently located off the 2, 5, and Q trains, as well as the B12, B35, B44, and B49 bus lines.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Finished Roof Deck Parking (by availability) Virtual Doorman

amenities.other: Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space

details.description:
Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

details.description:
Introducing 581 Ocean, located in Kensington, alongside historical Ocean Parkway. 581 Ocean is a brand new luxury building offering 60 rental units.All units feature oversized windows, high-end modern appliances, gorgeous hardwood floors, and tasteful finishes throughout. Select units provide spacious balconies, patios, or private backyard spaces.Amenities include an elevator, lounge, gym, laundry room, bike storage, and parking garage.deally located on Ocean Parkway and 18th Avenue, you?ll have easy access to the B and Q trains at Newkirk Plaza as well as the F train at 18th Avenue and Ditmas Avenue stations. Prospect Park is just a 10 minute bike ride away.Make sure to enjoy all the diverse culture and dining this neighborhood has to offer.
Available 3/1

details.description:
Elevated Living at 527 Grand Ave in Prospect Heights
2 bedroom with 2 bath!
Welcome to 527 Grand Ave, a luxury community perfectly nestled in the vibrant Prospect Heights neighborhood. Offering 1 and 2 bedroom residences with spacious layouts, premium finishes, and thoughtful design, this property redefines modern living. Tons of natural sunlight throughout.
Residents enjoy unparalleled amenities, including: - A state-of-the-art fitness center - Expansive rooftop terrace with stunning skyline views - Dedicated children?s playroom - Business conference room for remote work and meetings - Convenient elevator access
Neighborhood Highlights: Prospect Heights is a blend of historic charm and contemporary culture. Stroll down tree-lined streets to uncover trendy restaurants, cozy cafes, and boutique shops. The iconic Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, and Brooklyn Museum are just steps away, offering lush green spaces and endless cultural experiences. Excellent transit options, including the A and C trains, make commuting to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn a breeze.
Live where convenience meets character. Schedule your tour today and make 527 Grand Ave your new home!

amenities.other: A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
Introducing 242 Newkirk, located in Kensington, right off the historical Ocean Parkway. 242 Newkirk is a brand new luxury building offering 44 rental units.
All units feature oversized windows, high-end modern appliances, gorgeous hardwood floors, and tasteful finishes throughout. Select units provide spacious balconies, patios, or private backyard spaces.
Amenities include a furnished roof deck, gym, elevator, laundry room, and bike storage.
Ideally located on Newkirk Avenue just off Ocean Parkway, you will have easy access to the B and Q trains at Newkirk Plaza as well as the F train at 18th Avenue. Prospect Park is just a 10 minute bike ride away.
Welcome home.

details.description:
? One Fifty Lawrence ? Elevated Living in the Heart of Downtown Brooklyn
Welcome to One Fifty Lawrence, a modern 25-story tower redefining Brooklyn living. Nestled between Fulton and Willoughby Streets, this striking new residence blends refined design, thoughtful amenities, and unbeatable convenience ? just steps from the Jay St?MetroTech subway hub.
Inside, discover bright studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments with expansive windows, high ceilings, and sleek finishes. Each home is crafted for comfort and style, featuring top-of-the-line appliances, in-unit laundry, and energy-efficient systems.
Residents enjoy access to an impressive amenity collection: a state-of-the-art fitness center, rooftop terrace with sweeping skyline views, resident lounge, and co-working spaces ? all within a pet-friendly community.
At One Fifty Lawrence, you?re surrounded by everything Downtown Brooklyn offers ? premier shopping, dining, and cultural destinations ? while being minutes from Manhattan and the rest of the borough.
Modern design. Urban energy. Unmatched convenience. This is One Fifty Lawrence.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C

details.description: Virtual tours available!Beautiful 2 BR / 2 bath duplex apartment with balcony in Williamsburg, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold. Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short distance to the JMZ trains

details.description: Explore refined living in this 2 Bed / 1 Bath at 144 West St in Greenpoint, Brooklyn. This boutique residence is nestled along the vibrant East River Waterfront, offering spacious layouts and elegant interiors. With floor-to-ceiling windows and warm oakwood floors, the unit is filled with natural light and inviting design. The kitchen boasts custom ivory cabinetry, sleek white quartz countertops, and Bosch stainless steel appliances, while the in-unit washer and dryer add modern convenience. The bathroom is your private retreat with a deep soaking tub. This pet-friendly building is also conveniently close to the G train at Greenpoint Avenue, making your commute a breeze.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Microwave, Central A/C, Hardwood Floors

details.description:
----- Luxury 2 bedroom 1bath, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances

Gorgeous Brand New 1 Bedroom/ 1.5 bathroom DUPLEX Apartment in the Heart of East Williamsburg! The building has everything you want and need- elevator, fully-equipped gym, laundry room, bike storage, communal lounge on every floor. And best yet, a rooftop with amazing views and a gorgeous garden!This unit has 1 Large Queen size bedroom, all equipped with closets and floor to ceiling windows bringing in tons of sunlight! The Lower Level is a massive optional room or second living room with a half bathroom and separate entrance. PARKING AVAILABLE!
Featuring Stainless Steel Appliances, Dishwasher, Central AC and Heat, and hardwood floors, this apartment not only offers luxury, but also the comfort of a new home for you. You are just minutes from the Montrose L train and the Flushing JMZ trains.

details.description:
Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.
AMENITIES
? Central A/C
? High Ceilings
? Natural Light in Living Area
? Elevator
? Video Intercom
? Bike storage
? Gym
? Roof access
? Common courtyard
? Outdoor Space
? Stainless Steel Appliances
? Stone countertops
? Laundry in building
? Private parking
? Hardwood Floors
? Recreation room
? Business room

Experience the best of Brooklyn on the Greenpoint waterfront, just moments from Williamsburg. This premier rental building offers a collection of beautifully crafted residences, from stylish studios to expansive three-bedroom penthouses?many with private outdoor spaces and breathtaking views of the East River and Manhattan skyline.
Every home features elegant modern finishes, high-end appliances, and the convenience of an in-unit washer and dryer, blending luxury with everyday comfort.
Residents enjoy an impressive array of amenities, including: ? Cutting-edge fitness center ? Coworking and resident lounge ? Game room ? Rooftop terrace with panoramic views
Where design meets convenience, and the city is at your doorstep?discover waterfront living reimagined.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Balcony/Terrace

details.description:
Luxury Apartments at 931 Carroll Street
Welcome to 931 Carroll Street, a brand-new luxury rental building in the heart of Brooklyn. Just a block from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, and within walking distance of Prospect Park, this location offers an unbeatable blend of culture and nature. Only 2 blocks from the 2, 3, 4, 5 trains and the Shuttle to the A, C, Q trains, you're perfectly positioned for quick access across the city.
Offering studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments, each unit boasts modern design, premium finishes, and oversized windows with stunning views.
Features include: In-unit washer/dryer Dishwasher Hardwood floors Private outdoor space (balcony, courtyard, or patio) Central air and expansive windows for natural light
Building Amenities: State-of-the-art fitness center Landscaped rooftop terrace with panoramic city views Tranquil courtyard for relaxation Garage parking, bike room, and storage options Media room, package room, and pet spa
Live in luxury, surrounded by cultural landmarks and green spaces. With excellent public transportation and nearby shopping and dining options, 931 Carroll Street is your gateway to the best of Brooklyn.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C

details.description:
Step into this massive 2-bedroom, 2-full-bathroom charmer, boasting exposed brick walls and stunning woodwork throughout!
Features:
- Expansive bedrooms, each fitting a queen-size bed and additional furniture with ease - 2 full bathrooms, providing ample space and convenience - Charming exposed brick walls and beautiful woodwork on walls and ceiling - Additional 2 rooms in the upstairs, perfect for: ? Home offices ? Living spaces ? Creative studios
- Prime location, just 1 block from the J-M-Z train lines - Bordering East Williamsburg and Bushwick, with Bushwick Avenue just 2 blocks away - Endless shopping, dining, and entertainment options at your doorstep
This incredible property offers unparalleled space, character, and convenience. Perfect for roommates, or entrepreneurs seeking a unique living experience. Schedule a viewing today and make it yours!

Stunning 2 Bedroom Loft-Style Apartment in hart of Bushwick!
Just one block to the famous maria Hernandez park!
Discover the ultimate in modern living in this beautiful 2 bedroom loft-style apartment, perfectly situated in the heart of Bushwick.
Apartment Features - 2 spacious bedrooms with loft-style design, offering a unique and industrial-chic living experience - Double the space, you could have your office in the room. - Plenty of closet and storage space - High ceilings and open spaces, providing a sense of freedom and creativity
Prime Location - Located in a vibrant neighborhood, steps away from: - Trendy cafes and restaurants - Galleries and art spaces - Public transportation, making it easy to commute to anywhere in the city
Ideal for - Artists, creatives, and individuals looking for a stylish and modern living space - Those who value proximity to public transportation and a thriving neighborhood
Contact Contact us today to schedule a viewing and make this incredible loft-style apartment yours

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors

details.description:
Unique Duplex Apartment for Rent in Bushwick!
Steps to the Maria Hernandez Park! and the L train line!
Discover the ultimate in space and creativity in this stunning duplex apartment, perfectly situated in the heart of Bushwick.
Apartment Features - 3 spacious bedrooms, providing ample space for rest and relaxation - 2 additional rooms in the basement, perfect for a studio, office, or hobby space - 1 full bathroom, conveniently located for residents
Prime Location - Located in a vibrant neighborhood - 1 block to Maria Hernandez Park - 2 blocks to the L train at Dekalb Avenue - Steps away from trendy cafes, galleries, and public transportation, making it easy to enjoy all that Bushwick has to offer
Ideal for - Artists, creatives, and individuals looking for a unique and spacious living experience - Those who value proximity to public transportation, parks, and a thriving neighborhood
Contact Contact us today to schedule a viewing and make this incredible duplex apartment yours!

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Duplex, Backyard

details.description:
Welcome to 372 Kosciuszko, where industrial charm meets modern convenience in one of Brooklyn?s most vibrant neighborhoods. This spacious and stylish 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom home features an open-concept layout with bedrooms at opposite ends?perfect for privacy and comfort. Enjoy hardwood floors throughout, oversized windows, and a sleek full bathroom.
The Apartment ? Two large, sun-filled bedrooms ? Open-concept living and dining area ? Full modern bathroom ? Hardwood floors throughout ? Pet-friendly
The Building A former factory reimagined as an upscale residential hub, 372 Kosciuszko offers top-notch amenities, all included at no extra charge: ? Fully equipped fitness center ? Yoga/dance studio ? Lounge with pool table and big-screen TV ? Studio/meditation room ? In-house laundry ? Rooftop with panoramic skyline views ? Theater room ? Secure bike storage ? Elevator, live-in super, and a welcoming, artistic community
Prime Location Surrounded by hip cafes, bars, parks, and top schools?including Pratt Institute?this location offers an unbeatable urban lifestyle. ? 93 WalkScore, 97 TransitScore, 80 BikeScore ? Easy access to the G/J/M trains and B43/B38 buses ? Quick commute to Williamsburg, Downtown Brooklyn, Manhattan, and Long Island City
Don't miss this opportunity to live in a building where character, community, and convenience come together.

amenities.other: Above "8" ceilings, Abundance of natural light, Dishwasher

details.description:
Welcome to a residence that combines modern luxury with the timeless charm of Prospect Lefferts Gardens, one of Brooklyn?s most historic neighborhoods.
Located only blocks from Prospect park Near Kings County Hospital
This is a gorgeous lux building offering modern features and a sweet lux vibe. The unit offers 3 beautiful bedrooms with a closet, xl windows, chandelier and remote controlled internal heat and A/C. Stainless steel kitchen with full appliances, microwave, dishwasher, large cabinets; Cozy living room with bluetooth speakers and hardwood floors, energy-efficient internal heat and A/C in each room and a beautiful bathroom with a bathtub. Balcony! and this is a treasure to have ;)
ONE YEAR MINIMUM LEASE
The building is a beautiful space offering designer features, beautiful neat hallways and great 24/7 amenities, there is no amenities fee!
- Large complete top-floor gym - Yoga room - Relaxation room - Laundry room - Bike room - Lounge with beautiful resting areas, wifi internet, tv with cable and a pool table and outdoor space - Private parking (Extra charge) - 2 great city view furnished rooftops
Just minutes away and only blocks to Prospect Park, offering ample opportunities for outdoor recreation, leisurely strolls, and a peaceful retreat from city life. The location is very convenient for professionals as it has a very easy and fast access to the city. It is also Ideally located near Kings County Hospital, the neighborhood is a hub for healthcare professionals and staff fostering a vibrant and welcoming community of doctors. The area?s multicultural roots shine through in its eclectic mix of local restaurants, cafes, and shops along Flatbush and Nostrand Avenues. Perfect Location and easy transportation! Enjoy quick and easy access to downtown Brooklyn and Manhattan in less than 30 minutes with nearby B, Q, 2, and 5 subway lines, ensuring a seamless connection to the city.

amenities.other: A/C, Hardwood Floors

details.description: Massive two bed two bath prime Clinton Hill W/D in unit Tons of sunlight Massive living room King size bedrooms Lots of amenities
